reviews.text: This station is good for catching fast train to Edinburgh or Glasgow there one every 15mins the bus service to the train station needs improvement plus the station platform could do with updating, Taxis sometimes sit here at peak times, carpark is free, and this train station sits near the union canal an is near to callender park also but it's situated just in the edge off the main town at the top off big hill which in winter if icey could be difficult for passengers that wish walk up this station has staff here all time,

There is a bus connectivity from Falkirk High railway station to Falkirk wheel. I didn't find any cabs from the well known taxi operators so got to know that there is a local taxi operators called "Express Taxis". Installed their App and booked a taxi which arrived in few minutes. By taxi it was about £7 (if want to know) to Falkirk wheel.

Modern, clean and tidy station. Helpful and polite staff.

Regular services to Edinburgh and Glasgow on decent electric trains. No pacers in sight
I love that Falkirk has 2 stations
Really enjoy looking at the Falkirk Wheel. Such a magnificent engineering.
